title: "template"
output: html_document
params:
  obj_list: !r list()
  aspect_ratio: !r FALSE

---

**Date: `r lubridate::today()`**

```{r plots_2_html_chunk1, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE, warning = FALSE, message = FALSE, results = 'markup')
```

```{r plots_2_html_chunk2, include = TRUE, echo = F}


print_plot = function(p, aspect_ratio){
  
  if( ! is.logical(aspect_ratio) ){
    p = p +
      theme( aspect.ratio = aspect_ratio )
  }
  
  print(p)
  
}

params$obj_list %>%
  walk(print_plot, aspect_ratio = params$aspect_ratio )

```
